title: Welcome to Mr. Stash
hero_title: Mr. Stash's Emporium of Used Goods
hero_subtitle: Cars, Clothes, Tech. If it's used, we have it.
feature_mint_desc: Like new. Zero scratches. Original packaging often included. For the perfectionist.
feature_good_desc: Gently used. Fully functional. Minor cosmetic wear. The sweet spot of value.
feature_fair_desc: Well-loved. Visible wear but works perfectly. Greatest savings for the pragmatist.
features_subheading: We grade every item so you know exactly what you're getting.
new_arrivals_desc: Check out what Mr. Stash just dragged in.
newsletter_desc: Mr. Stash finds the good stuff early. Join the list to get first dibs.
layout3_subtitle: No fluff. Just quality used goods.
layout5_title: I'm Mr. Stash. I sell things.
layout5_desc: Look, I'm a rooster. I have a lot of stuff. You want it? Buy it. It's simple. I collect the best used cars, clothes, and tech. Why? Because I like shiny things. But now I have too many.
layout5_quote: One man's trash is another rooster's treasure. But this isn't trash. It's the Stash.
